definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Temporary mount directory where sysadmins can mount filesystems.
sentences.chinese: 系統管理員臨時加載文件系統的地方。

sentences.english: I work as a network and systems administrator for a mid-sized company.
sentences.chinese: 我就職於一家中型企業擔任網絡和系統管理員工作。

sentences.english: The experienced senior sysadmin works on the initial class design.
sentences.chinese: 有經驗的高級系統管理員可以實現最初的類設計。

sentences.english: Ask your administrator for the dispatcher location that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 向您的系統管理員詢問應該使用的調度程序位置。

sentences.english: Between units directly under the department scientific and technological management and systematic management.
sentences.chinese: 直屬單位科技管理與系統管理的關係。

sentences.english: Even a system administrator can have tasks routed to him or her.
sentences.chinese: 系統管理員甚至也可能收到路由給他的任務。

sentences.english: This practice, however, may be prohibited by your system administrators.
sentences.chinese: 但是這一實踐可能會被系統管理員禁止。

sentences.english: Contact your system administrator and ask to get access to pppd.
sentences.chinese: 請和您的系統管理員聯繫。

sentences.english: Pharaoh was pleased with Joseph. He put him in charge of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 法老王很喜歡約瑟，就派他統管埃及。

sentences.english: It also helps the system administrators in managing the business processes.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它也可以幫助系統管理員管理業務流程。

sentences.english: U. S. Cyber Command unified management of network security and network operations command.
sentences.chinese: 網絡司令部統管美軍網絡安全和網絡作戰指揮。

sentences.english: You need to have system administrator privileges to do this.
sentences.chinese: 需有系統管理員權限才能做到這一點。

sentences.english: The topic of partitioning and filesystems is a contentious one among system administrators.
sentences.chinese: 分區和文件系統是系統管理員們爭論的主題之一。

sentences.english: Reducing the management workload of the systems administrator.
sentences.chinese: 減少系統管理員的管理工作量。

sentences.english: Of the children of Perez was the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.
sentences.chinese: 他是法勒斯的子孫，統管正月班的一切軍長。

sentences.english: Please contact your network administrator for assistance.
sentences.chinese: 請聯繫您的網路系統管理員以求得幫助。
